title: Recipe Scraper Schema Sync
description: Realign the recipe scraper UI client (types, API client, hooks, tests, UI) with the v2 backend API specification. The backend was completely rewritten with breaking changes. See docs/recipe-scraper-v2-migration.md for the complete field-level schema diff reference.

title: Type Layer Updates
description: Foundation type updates: base URL, error types, enums, nutrition types, health types, allergen types. All downstream work depends on this. See docs/recipe-scraper-v2-migration.md sections A, D, E, F, G.

title: Update base URL in service config
description: File: src/config/services.ts:42. Change RECIPE_SCRAPER URL from 'http://sous-chef-proxy.local/api/recipe-scraper' to 'http://sous-chef-proxy.local/api/v1/recipe-scraper'. See migration ref Section A.

title: Restructure ErrorResponse and add ErrorDetail type
description: File: src/types/recipe-scraper/responses.ts. Replace ErrorResponse { detail, error_code, error_type } with { error (required), message, details?: ErrorDetail[], requestId? }. Add new ErrorDetail type { code, message, field? }. Update exports in index.ts. See migration ref Section D.

title: Update enums - add NutrientUnit, allergen enums, remove FoodGroupEnum
description: File: src/types/recipe-scraper/enums.ts. Add: NutrientUnit (GRAM, MILLIGRAM, MICROGRAM, KILOCALORIE), AllergenPresenceTypeEnum (CONTAINS, MAY_CONTAIN, TRACES), AllergenDataSourceEnum (USDA, OPEN_FOOD_FACTS, LLM_INFERRED, MANUAL). Remove: FoodGroupEnum. Update exports in index.ts. See migration ref Sections E, G, E5.

title: Restructure nutrition types
description: File: src/types/recipe-scraper/nutrition.ts. LARGEST type change. Add NutrientValue interface { amount?: number|null, measurement: NutrientUnit }. Restructure MacroNutrients: all fields become NutrientValue, absorb sugar/fiber/sodium from sub-objects. Restructure Fats: fatG->total, saturatedFatG->saturated etc, remove omega-3/6/9. Restructure Vitamins: drop Mg suffix, use NutrientValue. Restructure Minerals: drop Mg suffix, use NutrientValue, move sodium to MacroNutrients. Remove Sugars, Fibers, IngredientClassification interfaces. Update IngredientNutritionalInfoResponse: remove classification, add usdaFoodDescription. Update exports. See migration ref Sections E1-E6.

title: Update health types to camelCase
description: File: src/types/recipe-scraper/health.ts. HealthCheckItem: response_time_ms -> responseTimeMs. HealthCheckResponse: uptime_seconds -> uptimeSeconds, external_apis -> externalApis, database_monitoring -> databaseMonitoring, last_check -> lastCheck, response_time_ms -> responseTimeMs. See migration ref Sections F1-F3.

title: Add allergen types
description: Add to src/types/recipe-scraper/responses.ts or new file. Create AllergenInfo { allergen, presenceType, confidenceScore?, sourceNotes? }, IngredientAllergenResponse { ingredientId?, ingredientName?, usdaFoodDescription?, allergens[], dataSource?, overallConfidence? }, RecipeAllergenResponse { contains?, mayContain?, allergens?, ingredientDetails?, missingIngredients? }. Update index.ts exports. See migration ref Section G.

title: API Client Layer Updates
description: Update all API methods for new endpoint paths, query param renames, error handling changes, and create new allergens API module. See docs/recipe-scraper-v2-migration.md sections B, C, D, H.

title: Update RecipeScraperApiError class and error handlers
description: File: src/lib/api/recipe-scraper/client.ts. RecipeScraperApiError class: rename error_code to error, remove error_type, add details and requestId properties. responseErrorHandler L47: errorData?.detail -> errorData?.message. handleRecipeScraperApiError L83-138: update all references to detail/error_code/error_type. See migration ref Section D.

title: Update recipes API endpoints
description: File: src/lib/api/recipe-scraper/recipes.ts. createRecipe L19: /create-recipe -> /recipes. getPopularRecipes L43: /popular-recipes -> /recipes/popular. Rename param L38: count_only -> countOnly. See migration ref Sections B, C.

title: Update nutrition API params
description: File: src/lib/api/recipe-scraper/nutrition.ts. Rename params L24: include_total -> includeTotal. L25: include_ingredients -> includeIngredients. See migration ref Section C.

title: Update ingredients API endpoint and params
description: File: src/lib/api/recipe-scraper/ingredients.ts. L36: /recommended-substitutions -> /substitutions. L28: count_only -> countOnly. See migration ref Sections B, C.

title: Update pairing API endpoint and params
description: File: src/lib/api/recipe-scraper/pairing.ts. L29: /pairing-suggestions -> /pairings. L23: count_only -> countOnly. See migration ref Sections B, C.

title: Update health API - paths and remove liveness/legacy
description: File: src/lib/api/recipe-scraper/health.ts. L84: /api/readiness -> /ready. L109: /api/health -> /health. Remove getLiveness() (L49-65) entirely. Remove getLegacyHealth() (L121-133) entirely. Update readiness inline type L77: response_time_ms -> responseTimeMs. See migration ref Sections B, F3.

title: Update admin API - method, path, response
description: File: src/lib/api/recipe-scraper/admin.ts. L13: recipeScraperClient.post('/admin/clear-cache') -> recipeScraperClient.delete('/admin/cache'). Remove success: boolean from return type. See migration ref Section H.

title: Create allergens API module
description: New file: src/lib/api/recipe-scraper/allergens.ts. Create getIngredientAllergens(ingredientId) -> GET /ingredients/{id}/allergens returning IngredientAllergenResponse. Create getRecipeAllergens(recipeId, params?) -> GET /recipes/{id}/allergens (params: includeIngredientDetails) returning RecipeAllergenResponse. Update src/lib/api/recipe-scraper/index.ts exports. Follow existing patterns from other API modules. See migration ref Sections B, G.

title: Hooks & Constants Updates
description: Update query keys constants, rename hook params from snake_case to camelCase, remove liveness/legacy health hooks, create allergen hooks. See docs/recipe-scraper-v2-migration.md sections B, C.

title: Update query keys constants
description: File: src/constants/index.ts. Remove LIVENESS and LEGACY_HEALTH from QUERY_KEYS.RECIPE_SCRAPER. Add INGREDIENT_ALLERGENS: ['recipeScraper', 'ingredientAllergens'] and RECIPE_ALLERGENS: ['recipeScraper', 'recipeAllergens']. See migration ref Section B.

title: Update recipe hooks param names
description: File: src/hooks/recipe-scraper/use-recipe-scraper-recipes.ts. Rename count_only -> countOnly in usePopularRecipes hook params. See migration ref Section C.

title: Update nutrition hooks param names
description: File: src/hooks/recipe-scraper/use-recipe-scraper-nutrition.ts. Rename include_total -> includeTotal and include_ingredients -> includeIngredients. See migration ref Section C.

title: Update ingredient hooks param names
description: File: src/hooks/recipe-scraper/use-recipe-scraper-ingredients.ts. Rename count_only -> countOnly. See migration ref Section C.

title: Update pairing hooks param names
description: File: src/hooks/recipe-scraper/use-recipe-scraper-pairing.ts. Rename count_only -> countOnly. See migration ref Section C.

title: Update health hooks - remove liveness/legacy
description: File: src/hooks/recipe-scraper/use-recipe-scraper-health.ts. Remove useRecipeScraperLiveness and useRecipeScraperLegacyHealth hooks. Update src/hooks/recipe-scraper/index.ts exports to remove them. See migration ref Section B.

title: Update admin hook return type
description: File: src/hooks/recipe-scraper/use-recipe-scraper-admin.ts. Remove success from useClearRecipeScraperCache mutation return type. See migration ref Section H.

title: Create allergen hooks
description: New file: src/hooks/recipe-scraper/use-recipe-scraper-allergens.ts. Create useIngredientAllergens(ingredientId) and useRecipeAllergens(recipeId, params?) hooks using TanStack Query. Use QUERY_KEYS.RECIPE_SCRAPER.INGREDIENT_ALLERGENS and RECIPE_ALLERGENS. Enable when ID > 0. Update src/hooks/recipe-scraper/index.ts exports. Follow existing hook patterns. See migration ref Sections B, G.

title: API Test Updates
description: Update all API layer unit tests: error mocks, endpoint paths, nutrition mock data restructure, new allergen tests. See docs/recipe-scraper-v2-migration.md for all field mappings.

title: Update client tests for error handling changes
description: File: tests/unit/lib/api/recipe-scraper/client.test.ts. Update all ErrorResponse mocks: detail->message, error_code->error, remove error_type. Update RecipeScraperApiError assertions for new property names. Update baseURL assertion to include /v1/. See migration ref Section D.

title: Update recipes API tests
description: File: tests/unit/lib/api/recipe-scraper/recipes.test.ts. Update endpoint path assertions: /create-recipe -> /recipes, /popular-recipes -> /recipes/popular. Rename count_only -> countOnly in test params. See migration ref Sections B, C.

title: Update nutrition API tests
description: File: tests/unit/lib/api/recipe-scraper/nutrition.test.ts. LARGE task. Restructure ALL mock nutrition data from flat strings (fatG, vitaminAMg, etc.) to NutrientValue objects ({amount, measurement}). Remove all IngredientClassification, Sugars, Fibers, FoodGroupEnum references from test fixtures. Update param names: include_total -> includeTotal, include_ingredients -> includeIngredients. See migration ref Sections E1-E6.

title: Hook Test Updates
description: Update all hook unit tests: param name changes, nutrition mock data restructure, remove liveness/legacy tests, new allergen hook tests. See docs/recipe-scraper-v2-migration.md for all field mappings.

title: Update recipe hook tests
description: File: tests/unit/hooks/recipe-scraper/use-recipe-scraper-recipes.test.tsx. Rename count_only -> countOnly in test params and assertions. See migration ref Section C.

title: UI Component Updates
description: Audit and update UI components that consume recipe scraper data: Popular Recipes page, error boundary demo. Verify no broken type references.

title: Validation & Cleanup
description: Final validation: run type-check, test suite, quality checks. Delete docs/recipe-scraper-v2-migration.md when all work is complete.
